amendment.description: To provide additional flexibility for the closing or relocation of Rural Development offices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 892 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 892 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6848-6849; text: CR 10/20/2011 S6849) To provide additional flexibility for the closing or relocation of Rural Development offices.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 892 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 892 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
